mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OREQUEST (ONUM, EMPNO, PROCODE, OAMOUNT, OCOMMENT, REGDATE, CHECKS, DELETED) VALUES(ONUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{empno}, #{procode}, #{oamount}, #{ocomment}, SYSDATE, 0, 0)
INSERT INTO OREQUEST (ONUM, EMPNO, PROCODE, OAMOUNT, OCOMMENT, REGDATE, CHECKS, DELETED) VALUES((SELECT MAX(ONUM) FROM OREQUEST), #{empno}, #{procode}, #{oamount}, #{ocomment}, SYSDATE, 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT ONUM, MAX(REGDATE) AS REGDATE, COUNT(*) AS CNT, MAX(EMPNO) AS EMPNO, MAX(PROCODE) AS PROCODE FROM OREQUEST WHERE EMPNO=#{empno} AND CHECKS=0 GROUP BY ONUM ORDER BY ONUM DESC
SELECT ONUM, MAX(REGDATE) AS REGDATE, COUNT(*) AS CNT, MAX(EMPNO) AS EMPNO, MAX(PROCODE) AS PROCODE FROM OREQUEST WHERE EMPNO=#{empno} AND CHECKS=1 GROUP BY ONUM ORDER BY ONUM DESC
